summary: MY FAMILY WAS ALMOST KILLED WHEN BOTH HEADLIGHTS WENT OUT AT THE SAME TIME ON A DARK MOUNTAIN ROAD.  THIS SHOULD BE A RECALLED ITEM.   PEOPLE WILL DIE WHEN BOTH LIGHTS GO OUT AND THEY ARE NOT AS LUCKY AS WE WERE.   I PAID OVER $600 TO HAVE BOTH OF THESE LIGHTS REPLACED.    I AM SHOCKED THAT THIS ITEM HAS NOT BEEN ISSUED AS A RECALL ITEM.  *TR
